item.title: The ‘Get a Mac’ Oral History Podcast
item.itunes:author: campaignlive.com
item.itunes:subtitle: John Hodgman, Justin Long and scriptwriter Jason Sperling share stories of the legendary Apple campaign and revisit unaired scripts.
item.description:
Listen: The 'Get a Mac' oral history podcast

by Campaign Staff

John Hodgman, Justin Long and scriptwriter Jason Sperling share stories of the legendary Apple campaign and revisit unaired scripts.

To commemorate the 10-year anniversary of Apple's "Get a Mac," Campaign US has compiled an oral history of the campaign told by the writers, crew and actors who lived it. (Read Part 1 here; Part 2 will be available Wed., Dec. 7.)

Last month, John Hodgman, Justin Long and Jason Sperling, former TBWA\Chiat\Day creative director and head script writer for "Get a Mac," gathered together for the first time since the final shoot, in the Campaign US New York office, to share stories, laugh and revisit some unaired scripts. You can listen to or download the podcast below.
item.itunes:keywords: get a mac,commercial,advertising,john hodgman,justin long,jason sperling
